item.title: Terraform Hello World on AWS
item.description:
So you’ve heard about Terraform, you here that its another cool product developed by HashiCorp and so you want it try it out.

Here’s one of the simplest tutorials possible.

provider "aws" {
    access_key = "ABC123"
    secret_key = "DEF456"
    region = "us-east-1"
}

resource "aws_instance" "web" {
    ami = "ami-1ecae776"
    instance_type = "t2.micro"
}

$ terraform plan

Note: You didn't specify an "-out" parameter to save this plan, so when
"apply" is called, Terraform can't guarantee this is what will execute.
